title: On the origin of the Murchison meteorite phosphonates. Implications for pre-biotic chemistry.
abstract: NoAb initio calculations, combined with experimental studies on the anaerobic hydrolysis of phosphaalkynes under thermal and photochemical conditions suggest a potential, exogenous source of reduced oxidation state phosphorus for the early Earth
